channel.title: kitofr.github.io
channel.description: This blog will (hopefully) be a colleciton of my ideas and reflections about topics like politics, programming, change, health

item.title: Hello
item.description:
So, I realized I wanted to start writing again. Not that Iâ€™ve been an extensive writer in the past, but I ideas keep popping up that I want to write down. Hence, this blog.

OK, now as we got that figured out; what the heck am I going to blog about? As mentioned, different inquiries keep coming back to me. Philosophical, technical and various other subjects, such as health, learning, motivation.

I hope you enjoy can inspire me to write more, and gain better insights on the subject at hand.

Cheers, Kristoffer
